Pre_conditions: Open the website www.dybok.com.ua, be authorized.
Steps: 1) Go to the website www.dybok.com.ua 2) In the upper right corner, click on the profile name. 3) In the “Email” field, enter an invalid email “*(*(@gmail.com” 4) Click the "Сохранить" button
Post_condition: Enter a valid email in the “Email” field.
Expected: The message “Email cannot contain special characters” should appear under the “Email” field.
